themes: modernization of marketing for art events
free and accessible art gallery events
celebration of successful events at the Carver
importance of public programming (interviews, talks, conferences)
aspiration for Austin to be on par with major art cities
key_phrases: More modern marketing for these art events
No tickets for art gallery events
Keep them free and accessible to the public
wonderful openings over the past couple years at the Carver
Long form interviews, artist talks, conferences, and events
elevate the conversation to make Austin a respected art city on par with LA and NYC
There is money here to fund this, but it is barely given out
solutions_proposed: implement more modern marketing for art events
eliminate ticketing for art gallery events
keep art events free and accessible
host long form interviews, artist talks, conferences, and events
increase funding distribution to support grander programming
